DESCRIPTION: Give a role to another member.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}give [@User | User ID] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Give the role to the user.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: Note: The bot must have a role higher than the role you are trying to give.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: Note: You must have a role higher than the role you are trying to give.
USAGE: {{prefix}}give [@User | User ID] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]
ALIASES: Give does not have any aliases.
MISSING_MANAGE_ROLES: In order to give a role to a user I need to have the **Manage Roles** permission.
NEED_USER: You did not provide a user to whom to grant a role to.
NEED_ROLE: You did not provide a role to give.
BOT_TOO_LOW: The bot's highest role is too low to give this role.
USER_TOO_LOW: You're highest role is too low to give this role.
SUCCESS: The **{{role}}** role has been given to **{{user}}**.
GIVEN_BY: {{user}} used the give command to give the role to this user.
